Package net.minecraft.advancements

Class DisplayInfo

java.lang.Object
net.minecraft.advancements.DisplayInfo
public class DisplayInfo  extends Object
Utility class for representing the display information of an Advancement.

    • announceChat

      private final boolean announceChat
      Whether the advancement's completion should be announced in chat.

    • background

      @Nullable
      private final ResourceLocation background
      The background texture for the advancement tab. This is only used for Root Advancement.

      The description of the advancement.

  • Constructor Detail

    • DisplayInfo

      public DisplayInfo(net.minecraft.world.item.ItemStack icon, Component title, Component description, @Nullable ResourceLocation background, FrameType frame, boolean showToast, boolean announceChat, boolean hidden)
      Constructs a new advancement display.
      Parameters:
      icon - The icon of the advancement.
      title - The title of the advancement.
      description - The description of the advancement.
      background - The background texture for the advancement tab. This is only used for Root Advancement.
      frame - The frame type of the advancement.
      showToast - Whether the advancement should show a toast notification.
      announceChat - Whether the advancement's completion should be announced in chat.
      hidden - Whether the advancement should be hidden.

      Returns:
